publication.title: Generalized Conflict Learning for Hybrid Discrete/Linear Optimization
publication.jconf: Principles and Practice of Constraint Programming
publication.keyword: Direct Search;Integer Program;Linear Optimization;State Space;Branch and Bound;Linear Program;
publication.abstract: An increasing range of problems in Artificial Intelli- gence and Computer Science, such as autonomous vehi- cle control and planning with resources, are formulated through a combination of logical, algebraic and cost constraints. Their solution requires a hybrid mixture of logical decision techniques and mathematical opti- mization. Using Disjunctive Linear Programs (DLPs) to formulate these problems, we present a novel

publication.title: English to Chinese Translation of Prepositions
